posts.name:
Spiros Xanthos
Spiros Xanthos
posts.content:
In my years building teams, I've noticed that exceptional performers in their first 90 days share something beyond just drive or skills - they aren't paralyzed by perfectionism. Here's what I've noticed to be a common characteristic in high-performing people when they are stepping into a new role:

• Take ownership of specific problems
• Move fast, iterate quickly
• Learn through action, not preparation
• Bring solutions, not just problems
• Show results within the first few weeks

The secret? It's about being proactive. It's not about being perfect.

Top performers don't wait until they understand everything. They pick a challenge, own it, and move fast while staying adaptable.

Remember: In startups, it's better to move fast and course-correct than to wait for perfect conditions. The velocity of execution and learning matters more than anything else.

comments.commentText: In pure research, it is just the opposite - move deep even if it seems quite slow. But that is bound to be due to often longer struggle phase of 2-3 years even in a Phd program and as Assistant professor and seemingly no time boundary for associate and full professors and independent researchers. Startups are an optimum combination of depth and speed - neither can be bad if the startup has to succeed. That's why all successful startups earn their success even though some failed startups might have failed purely due to luck factors also.

posts.name:
Jan Barlow
Jan Barlow
posts.content:
Admittedly, ChatGPT is a great resource.
It can also be an enabler.

Like when you want to use it to identify jobs that align with your job experiences.
News Flash: It's not about the job, it's about you.

There are times when you need to do the self-reflection work.
Reach within the depths of your beingness and ask, "What am I 'Called' to do now"?

posts.name:
Mitesh Parmar
Mitesh Parmar
posts.content:
One More exciting News from Swiggy Instamart Ahmedabad!  

We’re thrilled to announce that we’ve added 4 new PODs in Ahmedabad in just 11 days!
These new additions are part of our mission to enhance convenience and customer experience for the amazing people of Ahmedabad.

Here are the details of our newly launched PODs:
Odhav - Launched on January 2, 2025
Sola - Launched on January 8, 2025
Tragad - Launched on January 12, 2025
GIFT City - Launched on January 13, 2025

This incredible milestone wouldn’t have been possible without the hard work and dedication of our amazing team. A special thank you to, my buddy, whose unwavering support and commitment were instrumental in making this expansion reality. 
And we’re not stopping here – many more PODs are on their way to bring Swiggy Instamart even closer to our customers!

Here’s to delivering happiness and redefining convenience, one neighborhood at a time.
